messages.title: Our Hospital
messages.content: I will always fight for a real hospital to serve the people of Hemel Hempstead. The way Hemel people have been treated by this Government is a disgrace. They conducted a consultation which they then ignored.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Britain is the only G20 country still in recession. Priorities include dealing with the national debt and stimulating economic recovery. Proposals are to set out to eliminate a large part of the deficit within the first Parliament, make tough decisions on Government spending, cut complex taxes and end red tape, and give a strong voice to the sector in every region of the country.

Our green spaces are what make Dacorum special. Will fight to preserve our open space and upgrade agricultural land. May need to one day, we might not be able to rely on cheap food imports for ever. I will defend the green belt at all costs.

issues.economy: Britain is the only G20 country still in recession. Priorities include dealing with the national debt and stimulating economic recovery. housing.content: I will defend the green belt at all costs.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Promoted by I M Clapp on behalf of Mike Penning and Hemel Hempstead Conservatives all of Dacorum House, 196 High Street, Hemel Hempstead, Herts HP1 3AF. Printed by ...
